mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_weekly_nutrition_reviews( email, target_date, week_start_date, week_end_date, model, nutrition_assessment, guidance, request_context) VALUES (#{email}, #{targetDate}, #{weekStartDate}, #{weekEndDate}, #{model}, #{nutritionAssessment}, #{guidance}, #{requestContext}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE week_start_date = VALUES(week_start_date), week_end_date = VALUES(week_end_date), model = VALUES(model), nutrition_assessment = VALUES(nutrition_assessment), guidance = VALUES(guidance), request_context = VALUES(request_context)
